p: The positive samples for influenza A and B, detected by real-time RT-PCR analysis, were inoculated in confluent Madin-Darby canine kidney (MDCK) cells to isolate the influenza viruses. The cell culture tubes were then incubated at 34 Â°C with 5% CO 2 and observed daily for 5 days until the second passage to detect the specific cytopathic effect.
